meaningMnemonic: Your <kanji>versus</kanji> <kanji>plan</kanji> is to attack back. They've already attacked you once, so now it's time for your <vocabulary>counter plan</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
